Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30087268]Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcuss aureus (NCTC 10788)(MIC=8 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli (NCTC 10418)(MIC=8 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans (NCYC 1467)(MIC=4 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.30087268] 8% hemolysis at 0 μM , 40% hemolysis at 1 μM , 90% hemolysis at 2 μM against horse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.30087268] IC50 = 18.20 μM for H157.IC50 = 18.20 μM for PC3.IC50 = 132.10 μM for HMEC-1
Sequence Information.Structure Description: These three peptides existed in random coils in aqueous solution, they all adopted
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria, Antifungal activity agaist Candida albicans

Literature.Title: Biological Activities of Cationicity-Enhanced and Hydrophobicity-Optimized Analogues of an Antimicrobial Peptide, Dermaseptin-PS3, from the Skin Secretion of Phyllomedusa sauvagii
